entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 16. POP 40%
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness early this evening. 40 percent chance of flurries late this evening and overnight. Wind north 20 km/h becoming light early this evening. Low minus 16. Wind chill minus 10 this evening and minus 22 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Saturday 1 April 2023
